title: Andron: Cyrillic now seperately available / Special Serbian package
content:
I’ve just released seperate Cyrillic out of the Andron stock.  
You’ll find two versions and all about it [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016185654/http:/www.signographie.de/cms/front_content.php?idart=315).

A third package is available to especially furnish the needs of decent Serbian typesetting.

For those who want to try out there is a special [Test-Licence-Offering](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016185654/http:/www.signographie.de/cms/front_content.php?idart=316) for a limited time.

Your comments will be considered for a possible future update.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016185654im_/http:/typophile.com/files/AND_SATZ_1_2_CY_2_SRB_3645.JPG)
author: Andreas Stötzner
